subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice and Manchester United defeated Fulham, 2-0, to reclaim second place in the Premier League. Ronaldo, who finished second to A.C. Milan’s Kaka for the European Golden Ball award Sunday, scored in the 10th and 58th minutes. He has 13 goals in 11 games. Wayne Rooney returned after missing three games for United — as well as two for England — with an ankle injury and partnered with Carlos Tévez in attack.
